name: cucumber
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 a long, thin, pale green vegetable with dark green skin, usually eaten uncooked in salads
Isabelle Rozenbaum/PhotoAlto Agency RF Collections/GettyImages
Examples
Peel the cucumber and chop it into small cubes.I had a tuna and cucumber sandwich.

a long, thin vegetable that has a dark green outer skin and is pale green inside: Cucumbers are usually sliced and eaten raw in salads.
